comment: Best math professor that I have ever had. He makes the material seem easy. He is quick and to the point. I would take him for any class that you can!!
He is great! Will work with you! His tests are Hard but it evens out with the work in class and he doesn't grade very hard. Take him if you have the chance!! Super nice and down to earth

Mr. Sullivan is a really nice professor and great at explaining math concepts.  He doesn't over complicate the class and makes it very easy to be successful if you put forth the effort.  Tests can be tricky but you will be fine if you study. Take him!
